```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Load Packages Here:

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Load Raw Data Here:

```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("Competition Experiment Sp 2023 Data - Sheet1.csv")
```

Mutate Data Here:

A data table with the sums for every minute of every day per colony
```{r}
sum_data<- raw_data %>% 
  filter(! is.na(count)) %>% 
  group_by(colony, day, minute) %>%
  mutate(sum = sum(count))
sum_data
```
